column4: is it possibable to blow the read/write head on a cdrw/dvd+rw?
It's very high precision electronics, with very find tolerances for moving parts. You only get so many reads/writes before they fail. Some brands fail sooner than others. Does it report errors?
do you have a known good disk you can try in it? Also, power-cycle it to see if that helps...
sounds like it's crocked then, sorry....
